mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT C.C_NO, C.P_NO, P.P_IMG_PATH, P.P_NAME, P.P_PRICE, M.M_ID, P.P_STATE FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.P_NO = P.P_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE C.M_ID = #{m_Id} AND P.P_STATE != -1 ORDER BY C.C_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.P_NO = P.P_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE C.M_ID = #{m_Id}
